ETYMOLOGY: From Old English sum 'some' + body 'body, person'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word that can function as a noun phrase referring to a person, place, thing, idea, or quantity.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An unknown or unspecified person; a person.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Somebody left their umbrella in the hallway.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 有人把雨伞落在走廊里了。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person of importance or distinction.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: After years of hard work, he finally felt like he was somebody.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 经过多年的努力，他终于觉得自己是个重要人物了。
